                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        We Are NYUAD     Inspired by the iconic photoblog Humans of New York, We Are NYUAD is a collection of curated portraits and videos that feature the individuals who make up the NYUAD community. Through images and quotes, We Are NYUAD provides a glimpse into the ordinary lives of those who live, work, and learn at NYUAD and highlights what makes them extraordinary. Read more                                                                                                                Slavs and Tatars: Mirrors For Princes February 28 - May 30, 2015                                                    The NYUAD Art Gallery presents their most ambitious, immersive installation to date, featuring works from the art collective Slavs and Tatars. Mirrors for Princes is on view February 28 through May 30, 2015.
